org.unc.lac.baboon.aspect

Class HappeningControllerJoinPointReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.unc.lac.baboon.aspect.HappeningControllerJoinPointReporter

  • public class HappeningControllerJoinPointReporter
extends java.lang.Object
    In this Aspect are declared the pointcut and advices to be applied when a HappeningController annotated method execution JoinPoints is reached.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ariel Ivan Rabinovich, Juan Jose Arce Giacobbe

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HappeningControllerJoinPointReporter() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void afterHappening(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint)
      After the execution of the HappeningController annotated method, this advice updates the JoinPointObserver observer.
      void beforeHappening(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint)
      Before the execution of the HappeningController annotated method, this advice updates the JoinPointObserver observer.
      void happening(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint)
      The pointcut happening is defined as any execution of a method annotated with HappeningController
      static void setObserver(JoinPointObserver ho)

      • HappeningControllerJoinPointReporter

    • Method Detail

      • setObserver

        public static void setObserver(JoinPointObserver ho)

      • happening

        public void happening(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint)
        The pointcut happening is defined as any execution of a method annotated with HappeningController
        Parameters:
        joinPoint - The JoinPoint of execution reached. Is only one point of all the joinpoints that conform the pointcut.

      • beforeHappening

        public void beforeHappening(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint)
        Before the execution of the HappeningController annotated method, this advice updates the JoinPointObserver observer. This is done to allow the framework to manage the synchronization of the HappeningController annotated method.
        Parameters:
        joinPoint - The JoinPoint of execution reached. Indicates which instance of object and HappeningController method has triggered the advice.

      • afterHappening

        public void afterHappening(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint)
        After the execution of the HappeningController annotated method, this advice updates the JoinPointObserver observer. This is done to allow the framework to manage the synchronization of the HappeningController annotated method.
        Parameters:
        joinPoint - The JoinPoint of execution reached. Indicates which instance of object and HappeningController method has triggered the advice.
